memoiR

Templates to publish well-formatted documents both in HTML and PDF formats.

Gallery:

  • Memoir: HTML anf PDF outputs.
  • Simple article: HTML anf PDF outputs.
  • Stylish article: HTML anf PDF outputs.
  • Beamer Presentation: HTML anf PDF outputs.

A quick introduction is in vignette("memoiR").
